name: GetProjectGroupById
description: Use this endpoint to load a single Project Group by id/number.

$ul: **costAccountClosed**: The account number to register costs for closed projects.
**costAccountOngoing**: The account number to register costs for ongoing projects.
**costAccountOngoingType**: The type of account for costs for ongoing projects:
**costContraAccountOngoing**: The contra account number to register costs for ongoing projects.

**includeCostPriceInFinance**: If set to true, project costs will be included in accounting.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**includeSalesPriceInFinance**: If set to true, project revenue will be included in accounting.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**name**: The project group name.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: false

**number**: The unique number of the project group.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false
**salesAccountClosed**: The account number to register revenue for closed projects.
**salesAccountOngoing**: The account number to register revenue for ongoing projects.
**salesAccountOngoingType**: The type of account for revenue from ongoing projects:
**salesContraAccountOngoing**: The contra account number to register revenue for ongoing projects.
**type**: Project group types:

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.
